overview: Discover a world of complex, charismatic, highly intelligent creatures in Being Dolphin 4D. Skim the surface and swim to the depths with a pod of dolphins that share the ocean with all sorts of strange and wonderful animals. Set against breathtaking underwater views, this 4D ExperienceÂ® explores how dolphins engage with each other to survive, thrive and play in the ocean.
title: Being Dolphin 4D
